items.sentence: Do you really think doing that would be a good idea?
Tom couldn't read the menu because it was in French.
You didn't tell Tom what you wrote to Mary, did you?
The advice I got from Tom made me a better salesman.
The men who were here last night were Tom's friends.
Do you think that Tom could find Australia on a map?
Tom was the first person to encourage me to do this.
Tom is probably not the oldest person in the office.
Tom is one of the best singers that I've ever heard.
Tom doesn't play with his dog as much as he used to.
Mary told me that she thought that Tom was handsome.
I wanted Tom to do that, but he told me he wouldn't.
The company that Tom used to work for went bankrupt.
Would you like to learn a few useful French phrases?
You have to call the doctor and make an appointment.
We waited a reasonable amount of time and then left.
When I came home, I saw Tom passed out on the floor.
Tom and Mary did their best to raise their children.
Wouldn't it be better to ask Tom's permission first?
Tom works at the same company as you do, doesn't he?
I have something that I need to do after work today.
Which cities in Australia do you most want to visit?
I'm not going to be able to do everything by myself.
Tom and Mary were both high, but Tom was also drunk.
Loyalty is the most important thing in a friendship.
Tom will be moving into his new apartment on Monday.
You'd tell me if there were a problem, wouldn't you?
I forgot to put my wallet in my pocket this morning.
Tom spent all morning reading a book in the library.
I don't think that happened the way Tom said it did.
I'd like to talk to you about your grades in school.
A wooden house burns more easily than a stone house.
Some students find it difficult to follow the rules.
Almost one-third of all office workers wear glasses.
Tom doesn't do that as well as he should be able to.
Tom wasn't eating an apple. He was eating an orange.
Firemen are some of the bravest people in the world.
Learning French is something that we all have to do.
Tom wanted Mary to help him, but she didn't want to.
Tom isn't here to help Mary. He's here to help John.
Tom isn't in the classroom. I think he's in the gym.
We can't survive out here much longer without water.
There are only three more beers in the refrigerator.
Tom was skiing very fast when the accident happened.
Tom was a volunteer firefighter when he was younger.
I was finally able to do what I'd been trying to do.
There was a pretty girl with black hair in the park.
Don't go near the water until you learn how to swim.
With a little more patience, you would've succeeded.
Tom was worried that he might be late for the train.
